code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calculator";},[]);const calculateTotal=()=>{let sum=0;for(const[note,count]of Object.entries(notes)){sum+=note*count;}setTotal(sum);if(sum>300){setExceeds300(true);calculateNotesToTakeOut(sum-300);}else{setExceeds300(false);}};const calculateNotesToTakeOut=amount=>{const notesToTakeOut={};const sortedNotes=Object.keys(notes).sort((a,b)=>b-a);let remainingAmount=amount;sortedNotes.forEach(note=>{const noteValue=parseFloat(note);const noteCount=Math.min(Math.floor(remainingAmount/noteValue),notes[note]);if(noteCount>0){notesToTakeOut[note]=noteCount;remainingAmount-=noteCount*noteValue;}});setNotesToTakeOut(notesToTakeOut);};const
